summary:
This is the tomb of Orvar. It is located north-west of Half-Moon Mill.

I streamed the process of making this tomb on www.twitch.tv/wheeze202.

This is also my first ever mod for skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[B]
[size=5]
I stream all of my work on my twitch channel: www.twitch.tv/wheeze202

I\'m also leading a big project now, if you want to be a part of it please visit www.luftahraan.com
[/size][/b]

This is my first mod ever. This is a (very)short tomb that keeps the ancient nord hero they called Orvar.
It is located North-West of Half-Moon Mill (which Is located near Falkreath)

I streamed the whole process here: www.twitch.tv/wheeze202


--Update v1.3
General Fixes for the archers (they behave properly now and use the high ground to their advantage )
Orvar now doesn\'t get spontaneously triggered before anything else gets triggered.
Due to this the Tomb\'s difficulty has increased a bit.
--Update v1.2
Added Oil to the corridor
Boss name is now Orvar.
Orvar is now much more difficult
Various other tiny improvements to Orvar.
--Update v1.1
Fixed Companions not following you inside.
Fixed archers falling through floor
Fixed the dwelling structure outside of the dungeon not appearing properly
Added a ramp up to the Archer\'s Ledge for you non ranged guys
Fixed the issue where a player gets stuck between the dragon statues.
Various NavMesh fixes.




Here are ways to get notified the moment I go live on twitch.tv:

The best way is to join my steam group:
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/wheezestream
This way you\'ll get notified instantly on your desktop when I go live.

The other way is to get the twitch tv app:
http://itunes.apple.com/us/app/twitchtv/id460177396?mt=8
This way you\'ll get notified the moment I go live. But I don\'t know if there is an android version
author: Wheeze
